name: Anastasios Nikolas Angelopoulos
content:
We love @Gradio.

It helped us scale to our first million users. Amazing and undervalued that Gradio can do this.

cc @_akhaliq

name: Jaydeep
content: Gradio was love at first sight..so easy to use

name: Will Rice
content: Just tried out @Gradio and I am very impressed. Only took like 10mins to put together a #tts demo.

name: Art Litvinau
content: I love how easy is to build quick prototypes with @Gradio ⚡️ this one took me 45 minutes with no previous experience with the library

name: Shirochenko Dmitriy
content: Spent the weekend prototyping LLM interfaces directly in Python. @gradio-app is a game changer for rapid UI development. Forget wrestling with JS/CSS; share your model in seconds. Thinking this unlocks serious iteration speed.

name: iCode2
content: Apart from being very easy to use, one thing that I simply love about @Gradio is its Javascript client, which makes it easy to build a nice HTML frontend for Python applications. This integration makes me rank gradio high in my list of favorite Python libraries.

name: Amar Saini
content:
Just built a ️@Gradio app for a video related deep learning project.
I’m astonished by how simple it is to use & how elegant it looks! Lots and lots of great features & flexibility. Thanks for making this ❤

name: Roxana Daneshjou MD/PhD
content: Honestly, without @Gradio, we would not be doing a real time AI trial. We have many other ideas for algorithms we want to test through clinical trials, and we know it's possible thanks to @Gradio.

name: Vinay Prabhu
content:
Dear #MachineLearning twitter,
If you haven't typed:
$ pip install gradio
yet, now would be a damn good time.
Especially if you are working in computer vision & deploying models in the real world.
